Title: Report on Exploration Work
Text:
Date of work: October 11, AL155
Work summary: Preliminary completion of the exploration unit distribution map mapping, can be roughly determine the orientation of the canal excavation. When collecting image information, encountered a small-scale TDTD Outbreak, Midnight Rangers special team support in time, only two members of the survey team suffered minor injuries, but the exploration equipment was seriously damaged.
Equipment supplies are expected to arrive in a week, until then the team will suspend all exploration work.
Assessment and observations: A raw mineralization of an unknown type of rock has been discovered within the boundaries of the site, which requires further excavation and testing of its structure and properties to determine its value. Construction and exploration work in this area has a high risk factor, and if any abnormalities are detected, work should cease immediately, the site should be evacuated, and Midnight Rangers should be called in to deal with the situation.
